warn.invalidTable: The table "{tableId}" could not be found

name.label: Token Name Interpolation
name.notes: Enter a token name with $$$ in it, the $$$ will be replaced with the text from the Rollable Table entry.

image.label: Token Image Selection
image.notes: Select an image to set the token image and name.

rollToChat.name: Roll To Chat
rollToChat.hint: When randomly rolling a token, should the result be sent to chat or rolled silently?
